params.name: scale
params.description: A function that takes an array of coins as a parameter and returns the weight of the coins.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The unique id of the bag. You have to return the id of the bad bag.

attributes.name: getCoins
attributes.description: Takes the number of coins you want to take out of the bag as an argument, and returns a array of coins. You can use this array, concatenate it with other coins and put it on the weight.
